runtime/component/durion-common/
  entity/
    DurCommonType.xml          # enums, status types
    DurUom.xml                 # units of measure
    DurGeo.xml                 # basic region/country if needed
  service/
    DurCommonServices.xml      # helper services
  script/
    groovy/
      DurCommonServices.groovy
  data/
    DurCommonSeed.xml
